allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add TUI discussion - concluded with minimal approach

Decisions:
- No TUI library, raw fmt.Print output
- Simple aligned columns, no colors/borders
- No interactivity, pure CLI commands

Rationale: Human output is secondary \(agents auto-get TOON via
TTY detection\). Zero dependencies for secondary features.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(go run -exec '' - <<'EOF'
package main

import \(
	"fmt"
	"time"
\)

func main\(\) {
	now := time.Now\(\).UTC\(\)
	fmt.Println\("RFC3339:", now.Format\(time.RFC3339\)\)
	fmt.Println\("Expected:", now.Format\("2006-01-02T15:04:05Z"\)\)
}
EOF)

Bash(go run -exec "go tool" <<'EOF'
package main

import \(
	"encoding/json"
	"fmt"

	"github.com/leeovery/tick/internal/task"
\)

func main\(\) {
	t := task.Task{
		ID:          "tick-a1b2c3",
		Title:       "Test task",
		Status:      task.StatusOpen,
		Priority:    2,
		Description: "A description",
		BlockedBy:   []string{"tick-x1y2z3"},
		Parent:      "tick-parent1",
		Created:     "2026-01-19T10:00:00Z",
		Updated:     "2026-01-19T10:00:00Z",
		Closed:      "2026-01-19T16:00:00Z",
	}

	data, _ := json.Marshal\(t\)
	fmt.Println\(string\(data\)\)
}
EOF)

Bash(go run -exec '' - <<'EOF'
package main

import \(
	"encoding/json"
	"fmt"

	"github.com/leeovery/tick/internal/task"
\)

func main\(\) {
	// Test minimal task \(no optional fields\)
	t1 := task.Task{
		ID:       "tick-a1b2c3",
		Title:    "Test task",
		Status:   task.StatusOpen,
		Priority: 2,
		Created:  "2026-01-19T10:00:00Z",
		Updated:  "2026-01-19T10:00:00Z",
	}

	data, _ := json.Marshal\(t1\)
	fmt.Println\("Minimal:", string\(data\)\)

	// Test full task \(all fields\)
	t2 := task.Task{
		ID:          "tick-a1b2c3",
		Title:       "Test task",
		Status:      task.StatusOpen,
		Priority:    2,
		Description: "A description",
		BlockedBy:   []string{"tick-x1y2z3"},
		Parent:      "tick-parent1",
		Created:     "2026-01-19T10:00:00Z",
		Updated:     "2026-01-19T10:00:00Z",
		Closed:      "2026-01-19T16:00:00Z",
	}

	data2, _ := json.Marshal\(t2\)
	fmt.Println\("Full:", string\(data2\)\)
}
EOF)
